Response.Say: Thanks for calling the CSS Dev Conf Text Voting Line. Please text your vote at (504) 299-6828 using you’re favorite mobile device. When casting your vote, the first text should be the hashtag of the session. Then a space. Then a rating of the session, which has a value of 1 to 5 (5 being the best). After the number rating, add another space. Then write any additional comments you’d like to send in with your vote. Thanks again for calling. You look great. Enjoy the rest of CSS Dev Conf New Orleans.
